price: Enti moho atͻ mo sε Nyankopͻn mma mo mmem wͻ asaase no so fa baabi, anaasε Ɔnnsoma mframa den a aboͻ wͻ mu mma moso a (saa berε no) monnya okyitaafoͻ biara mma mo ho?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلۡبَرِّ أَوۡ يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗا ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُواْ لَكُمۡ وَكِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afa-amintum an yakhsifa bikum jāniba al-bari aw yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban thumma lā tajidū lakum wakīlan
